title: Elly Schlein - Wikipedia
snippet: Elena Ethel "Elly" Schlein (Italian: [ˈɛlli ˈʃlain]; born 4 May 1985) is an Italian politician who has been serving as the secretary of the Democratic Party (PD) since 12 March 2023. She is a member of Italy's Chamber of Deputies and was previously the vice president of Emilia-Romagna and ...

title: Meet the anti-Renzi: Elly Schlein becomes first woman leader of Italy’s center left
snippet: Primary winner is a left-wing radical who once abandoned the party under centrist Prime Minister Matteo Renzi’s leadership. ... Elly Schlein has become the youngest leader and first woman at the helm of the PD | Fabio Frustaci/EPA-EFE ... Radical candidate Elly Schlein is the new leader of Italy’s traditionally center-left Democratic Party (PD), after winning a primary vote Sunday.

title: Italy's left picks 'anti-Meloni' politician Elly Schlein to lead the party | Euronews
snippet: Come the following year, and increasingly opposed to the labour reforms of the then-PM and party leader, Renzi, she ultimately parted ways with the PD and joined a splinter party, Possible (Possibile).
